OpsPlatform is responsible for a suite of platforms and services that power Gojek’s driver, merchant, and customer operations. At its core, OpsPlatform bridges the gap between the “offline world” and “online Gojek”. Our products span the gamut of the Gojek universe - driver and fleet onboarding; in-vehicle monetization to increase driver earnings; driver care operations in city walk-in centers; customer care and KYC workflows for drivers, merchants and customers; and sales technology products to empower the food and payment sales teams. The overarching company theme that we’ve made our own is this - Eliminate human bottlenecks and increase productivity 10X. 

Some of the problems our engineers are working on - complex ticket arbitration workflows that auto-resolve driver and customer tickets within seconds, ML-based ticket issue prediction systems, GoAgent app for assisted driver onboarding and product sales, KYC integrations with government agencies, facial recognition systems to combat fraud, and OCR-powered tech to bring efficiencies to driver and merchant onboarding workflows. Our product tech stack includes Ruby on Rails, GoLang, Clojure, React, Android (100% Kotlin), iOS (100% Swift).
